LanguageData.PLMWTT_ButtonResetTooltip: Reset all elements to their default (Partial) state.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_ButtonAllTooltip: Set all elements to the On state.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_ButtonNoneTooltip: Set all elements to the Off state.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_UseCoastalRoationTooltip: Allow to search for coastal ocean/sea tiles which have a coast facing a specific direction.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_IsCoastalTileLakeTooltip: A lake is at most 15 tiles of water surrounded by land.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_ORANDTooltip: Type of filtering to apply. OR: each item is evaluated independently. AND: all items are evaluated together.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_OffPartialTooltip: If True, Off and Partial states do not allow any tile selection. If false, they allow selection of tiles.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_StoneOrderTooltip: Whether Stone Filtering is order dependent or not.\nPress button to change filter state.
LanguageData.PLMWTT_UseNumberOfStoneTypesToolTip: Filter tiles that have only the given number of stone types (whatever the types are). This disables the other stone filters.
